daily_activities: Sightseeing: Visit Nelson's Dockyard National Park
Adventure Sports: Snorkeling at Cades Reef
Dining: Lunch at a local seafood restaurant
Museums: Explore the Museum of Antigua and Barbuda
Shopping: Browse the vendors at the Public Market
Nightlife: Enjoy cocktails at a beachside bar
Hiking: Hike to the top of Mount Obama for panoramic views
Sightseeing: Visit the historic English Harbour
Dining: Dinner at a fine dining restaurant
Adventure Sports: Take a kayak tour through the mangroves
Sightseeing: Visit the beautiful Valley Church Beach
Shopping: Shop for souvenirs at a local craft market
Nightlife: Experience the nightlife of St. John's
Dining: Farewell dinner at a waterfront restaurant

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to a major European or American hub (e.g., London, New York, or Miami), then connect to a flight to V.C. Bird International Airport (ANU) in Antigua. Possible airlines include British Airways, American Airlines, or Delta Air Lines.
